Delete Ringer Change Times:
 
 From A Single Day:
 Select the day of the week you want to delete the time from. A list will show the scheduled ringer change times for that day. Check all the times you want to delete, tap your menu key then select delete from the menu.

 A Single Time From A Batch Of Days:
 Tap the 'Batch Time Delete' button, a dialog will pop up. Input the time you want to delete and select to delete that time from all Weekdays, Weekend days, or All Days. Then tap the 'Delete Time From Selected Days' button.

 Delete Your Entire Schedule:
 Tap the 'Delete Entire Schedule' button. A dialog will ask you to confirm your choice, tap Yes to continue or No to cancel. This will remove all times for all days that you have entered ringer mode changes to occur.

Day-Of-Week:
 To schedule a ringer mode change, select a day of the week then input the time you want the change to occur. Select the mode you want the phone to change to at that time. Tap the 'Add Schedule' button and you should see a confirmation message in the box at the bottom of the view.

 Note:
 If you try to add a time that is already scheduled for that day and time, the schedule will be updated with the mode change you just selected.

 Note:
 When you schedule a ring mode change for a day of the week (Sun-Sat) your schedule will continue to change your ring mode every week on that day until you delete the scheduled time.

 Batch Days:
 You can also schedule a time and ringer mode and add it to multiple days at once. If you scroll to the bottom of the days of the week spinner you will see a selection for weekdays and weekends. Weekdays will add your time to Mon-Fri and weekends will add it to Sat-Sun.

 View/Delete Schedules:
 You can view or delete you scheduled items but tapping the 'View/Delete Schedules' button which will open a new view that will also have help instructions in the menu.
